project_plan.name: Random Password Generator
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password based on user-defined configurations.

task.name: Implement password generation logic with uppercase letters
Implement password generation logic with lowercase letters
Implement password generation logic with numbers
Implement password generation logic with special characters
Create function to allow user to specify password length
Write tests for the password generation functionality
Execute tests on the password generation to ensure proper functionality
